Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1980...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1984, off Fredrick Nottingham (HAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/30/1984, off James Gately (PON)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1985...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 9/21/1986...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1986...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 5/16/1987...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1987...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Halifax on 9/5/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1989, hitting .519 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1989, hitting .434 with 4 HR, 27 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Bay City on 9/3/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1989, hitting .609 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/3/1990 to a 6-year deal worth $13,500,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Syracuse in 1990...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1991, hitting .352 with 4 HR, 20 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Gashouse on 9/3/1992...
